hero.name: Ludovic Debever
hero.description: I'm a student software architect based in Paris. I'm passionate about any kind of software development and I love learning new things.

0.name: chess engine
0.description: A chess engine written from scratch. It is compatible with the UCI protocol, allowing it to be plugged into most chess GUIs. It uses a bitboard representation and a magic bitboard approach to generate moves.

1.name: chess challenge
1.description: My participation to a chess coding competition hosted by sebastian lague. Provided an api for handling the game rules, I had to create a chess bot within 1024 tokens

2.name: compiler
2.description: A toy programming language buult from scratch with the help of Immo Landwerth's series on building a compiler. It also contains an interpreter and a REPL

3.name: neural network
3.description: A neural network able to detect pneumonia on a chest X-ray. It is a Multi-Layer Perceptron built from scratch and is trained on a dataset of ~5000 images
